page.title: 10Shops and Pubs in Kimpton
page.content: There are three household shops in Kimpton which sell a variety of goods. The Corner Shop is in Claggy Road,it sells a variety of goods including video films. The Post Office is in the High Street,it is the main shop in the village and the only shop that sells newspapers. L.Martin is also in the High Street,near the Post Office.It is really a grocers but sells general goods. There are four pubs in the Kimpton district.In the High Street are The Boot,which has a garden and The White Horse.In Gustard Wood you can drink in The Crosskeys and The Tinpot .
